speech: Maybe some music would help. Try listening something relaxing.
Reading is a good way to unwind. But don't read something too emotional.
I can sing you a nice song.
Why not drink a glass of milk? Milk is good for you!
Have you tried ASMR? It works for some.
So, you can't sleep, and decided to talk to me? Well, ok.
Try a glass of water, and try to focus on someting positive. Something you look forward too.
Is there something on your mind maybe?
